page.title: 08IXWORTH RESIDENTS
page.content:
Ixworth is once again a growing village; as such it is interesting to note the large proportion of the population who have lived in the village for only a short time.
63% have lived here less than 15 years 12% have lived here all their lives 33% have lived here 5 years or less 16% have lived here 1 year or less
***************************************
The {"average"} resident in Ixworth lives in an owner occupied house with 3 occupants. The house has 1 living room, 3 bedrooms, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom and a garage. The family owns 1 car.
